A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: The Star Wars franchise has been ruined by Disney. I hated the Force Awakens\, so my expectations for this sequel were low. Arguably\, it was better than the Force Awakens in many ways. there were some very cool scenes in this movie. However\, the new characters are pointless and not worth rooting for. There is no continuity between JJ Abrahms and Rian Johnson\, which makes things even more difficult to sit through. Nothing is explained well. there are stupid pointless moments throughout the film. Overall\, it's a disgrace to true Star Wars fans.
